DCC
IP

Files

file  dcc.h
 This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of DCC. This also contains some related macros.
 

Data Structures

struct  dccConfigParams
 Structure containing parameters for DCC module configuration. More...
 
struct  dccRevisionId
 Structure for accessing Revision ID of DCC module. More...
 

Macros

#define DCC_SRC0_COUNT_MAX   (0xFFFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of count for clock source 0.
 
#define DCC_SRC0_VALID_MAX   (0x0FFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of valid count for clock source 0.
 
#define DCC_SRC1_COUNT_MAX   (0xFFFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of count for clock source 1.

DCC Interrupt type

 Enum for DCC interrupts.

#define DCC_INTERRUPTS_DONE   (0x1U)
 

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define DCC_CLK_SRC0_SYS_CLK1   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC0_CLKSRC0_0)

SYS_CLK1 is selected as source for COUNT0

#define DCC_CLK_SRC0_SYS_CLK2   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC0_CLKSRC0_1)

SYS_CLK2 is selected as source for COUNT0

#define DCC_CLK_SRC0_XREF_CLK   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC0_CLKSRC0_2)

XREF_CLK is selected as source for COUNT0

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_OTHER_CLK   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_OTHER)

OTHER_CLK is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_TEST_CLK1   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_0)

TEST_CLK1 is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_TEST_CLK2   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_1)

TEST_CLK2 is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_TEST_CLK3   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_2)

TEST_CLK3 is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_TEST_CLK4   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_3)

TEST_CLK4 is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_TEST_CLK5   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_4)

TEST_CLK5 is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_TEST_CLK6   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_5)

TEST_CLK6 is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_TEST_CLK7   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_6)

TEST_CLK7 is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_CLK_SRC1_TEST_CLK8   (DCC_DCCCLKSRC1_CLKSRC_7)

TEST_CLK8 is selected as source for COUNT1

#define DCC_INTERRUPTS_DONE   (0x1U)

Done interrupt signal

#define DCC_INTERRUPTS_ERROR   (0x0U)

The error signal

#define DCC_OPERATION_MODE_CONTINUOUS   (DCC_DCCGCTRL_SINGLESHOT_DISABLE)

Continuously repeat (until error)

#define DCC_OPERATION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT1   (DCC_DCCGCTRL_SINGLESHOT_MODE1)

Stop counting when counter0 and valid0 both reach zero

#define DCC_OPERATION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT2   (DCC_DCCGCTRL_SINGLESHOT_MODE2)

Stop counting when counter1 reaches zero

Typedef Documentation

typedef uint32_t dccOperationMode_t

Enum to select the DCC Operation Mode.

DCC can either operate in single shot or continuous mode.

Function Documentation

void DCCClearIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to clear interrupt status.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
intrMaskInterrupts to clear status. Refer enum dccIntrType_t.
Returns
None
int32_t DCCDisableIntr ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrType 
)

This API is used to disable interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
intrTypeInterrupts to disable. Refer enum dccInterrupts_t.
Returns
status Configuration status.
void DCCEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  enable 
)

This API is used to configure DCC module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
enableDCC is enabled if it is TRUE. DCC is disabled if it is FALSE.
Returns
None
int32_t DCCEnableIntr ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrType 
)

This API is used to enable interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
intrTypeInterrupts to enable. Refer enum dccIntrType_t.
Returns
status Configuration status;
void DCCGetConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
dccConfigParams_t *  configParams 
)

This API is used to get the configured DCC parameters.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
configParamsDCC configured parameters for operation. Refer enum dccConfigParams_t.
Returns
None
uint32_t DCCGetIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API is used to get occurred interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
Returns
status Occurred interrupts.
void DCCGetRevisionId ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
dccRevisionId_t *  revId 
)

This API is used get the DCC revision ID.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
revIdContains Revision ID of DCC module. Refer struct dccRevisionId_t.
Returns
None.
int32_t DCCSetConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const dccConfigParams_t *  configParams 
)

This API is used to configure DCC module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
configParamsDCC configuration parameters. Refer enum dccConfigParams_t.
Returns
status Configuration status. NOTE: If the value of 'seedValid0' is less then 4 then it will programmed as 4. Since minimum programmable value of the 'seedValid0' is 4.
